name: Multi Use Item
description: Determine one or more NPCs to use a specified item on a target.

item_mode.description: The name of the item to use.

target_npc_id.description: The ID of the target NPC.

source_npc_ids.description: An array containing the IDs of one or more NPCs that will be using the item on a target.

system_prompt_info: `{GPT_func_name}` if requested to use a specific item, make sure to check that the NPC is actually carrying the item before choosing them.
llm_feedback: {llm_output_source_names} are about to use a {llm_output_mode} from their inventory on {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. {llm_output_source_names} will complete this action to the best of their ability and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {llm_output_source_names} are about to use a {llm_output_mode} from their inventory on {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. Begin your response with <veto> if any NPC would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
